ruleFindUrl:
<js>importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);result="";
function find(www,mark){
css=".item a";mark="["+mark+"] ";
www="http://zuopinj.com/writer/"+www+".html";
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(www)).select(css).toArray().map(a=>mark+a.text()+"::"+a.attr("href")).join("&&"); result+=list; return result}
//备注：不需要的分类，在find前面加//，修改后，清空发现缓存生效。
//find("index","全部");
//find("huaren","中");
//find("guowai","外");
find("wuxia","武侠");
//find("xuanhuan","玄幻");
//find("kehuan","科幻");
//find("kongbu","恐怖");
//find("yanqing","言情");
//find("xiaoyuan","校园");
//find("net","网络");
result=String(result).replace(/(作品集)/g,"").replace(/(鲁迅|刘慈欣|王小波|莫言|东野圭吾|村上春树|张爱玲|三毛|金庸|古龙|梁羽生|温瑞安|黄易|燕垒生|江南)/g,"$1💯");
</js>

function decrypt(data){
    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

    var decryptedData = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data, key, {
        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}
